divs: Sighting Detailsi was filming the vatacan from a distance on top of paletine hill. i did not see a thing until i returned home and started editing film footage onto my compter a week later. i have broken down film footage to 11 mpeg images, to whitch the editing suite i have runs at 24 frames a second. actual real time speed broken down to recognise the image as the classic ufo shape.
